textBeforeTable: Model Measurements US sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 52in / 132cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Dry clean. 100% polyester. Fabric: Lace. A rich geometric pattern pops against a dramatic, contrast lining on this lace dress from Nanette Lepore. The long skirt falls to a curved, uneven hem, and an exposed zip closes the back. Sleeveless. Lined. Description Dresses > Clothing > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Nanette Lepore produced her first couture look at age nine by outfitting a neighbor in a floral bedspread, beaded choker, and face paint. A lifelong love of fashion was born. Today, Nanette Lepore dresses are the very definition of timeless femininity, not to mention a beautiful fit. Expect bright colors, flirty ruffles, garden florals and sophisticated silks from this celebrity and fashion editor favorite. Nuanced Nanette Lepore shoes, jackets, and skirts round out a collection of delectable confections.
